title: Saville interview
content:
Full disclosure, I did it :)

Think I got some interesting stuff out of him though.

[http://video.google.co.uk/videoplay?docid=-176676394177930990](http://web.archive.org/web/20130224080308/http:/video.google.co.uk/videoplay?docid=-176676394177930990 "http://video.google.co.uk/videoplay?docid=-176676394177930990")
author: rjohnston

comments.content: That was great. Thanks for posting.
I see it's a UK only video. How about posting to the US youtube or Google video too?
That was spot on. I agree with every point he makes.

to whom does the foreground head belong?

kidding. very interesting discussion.

_more than this..._
It seems to be working now. :-)
I still can't download the movie though, and I would really like to have a copy for posterity.
